summary: A cleanup of the marketplace. Placed trees in "buckets". New wooden flooring.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#b6d7a8][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74308-0-1458482787.png[/img]
Credit to [color=#d5a6bd][b]Jokerine[/b][/color] for the Forever Free! logo, download from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/58832/?]here.[/url][/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]
[b]Tropical Riften Marketplace[/b]

A cleanup of the market.
Placed trees in "buckets"
New wooden flooring

If you want the tropical looks you need to install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33017/?]Soolie's Tropical Skyrim[/url].
It is a total overhaul bringing tropical climate, vegetations and animals to Skyrim - Remember to credit Soolie and donate if that suits you.
I have created a plugin replacer - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74308/?]Tropical Skyrim II[/url] - TS II cleans up paths in caves and dungeons

Credit to other authors:
-[b]Tamira[/b] for Skyrim version of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22018/?]"New Plants"[/url].
-[b]Tiwa44[/b] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection[/url].
-[b]Brokefoot[/b] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415/?]UNP Mashup Compilation[/url] here.

This mod also works [u]without[/u] Tropical Skyrim.

Thanks to Bethesda Softworks for creating wonderous games
Thanks to my friends on the nexusmods[/color]
author: fredlaus
